titles.title: They That Trust In The Lord / I'm Like A Tree Like

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
They that trust in the Lord
Shall be as mount Zion
Which shall not be removed
From henceforth even forever

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I'm like a tree - like a tree
I'm like a green olive tree
In the house -
in the house of the Lord
And I will trust in the mercies
Of God forever
I will trust in the mercies of God
